name: jetpack-lazy-images
description: Speed up your site and create a smoother viewing experience by loading images as visitors scroll down the screen, instead of all at once.

scripts.test:php:setup: bash bin/install-wp-tests.sh wordpress admin admin db
scripts.test:phpunit: yarn test:php:setup && yarn test:php:env-start && ./bin/wait-for-it.sh localhost:33306 -- docker-compose up -d && docker-compose exec wordpress bash -c 'cd /var/jetpack-lazy-images; ./vendor/phpunit/phpunit/phpunit --colors=always' && yarn test:php:env-stop
